body: @gijsk I'm having trouble figuring out a `file:///` URL that points to the utils files, and I can't find any examples on DXR of others doing this. I'd prefer this to using `head.js` files though, so I'd like to get it working. Do you know how I can figure out the right URLs?
body_text: @gijsk I'm having trouble figuring out a file:/// URL that points to the utils files, and I can't find any examples on DXR of others doing this. I'd prefer this to using head.js files though, so I'd like to get it working. Do you know how I can figure out the right URLs?
